title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation
notes:
Errors: 1) Displays dialog box "DirectX Setup: Unable to find dsetup.dll". 2) No sound except for movies. 3) Title screen to opening movie loop is very short.
Performance: 60 fps gameplay. Graphics and animations look okay. Just no sound.

title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation
notes: Intro starts over and over again. however beeing active in the menu solves that

Fails to properly install DirectX during initial Steam launch; says "dsound.dll not found."   Then there is no in-engine audio.  The following attempts have NOT fixed this issue:  Manually installing Xact, manually installing D3DX9_42, setting xaudio2_7 and 2_6.dll to native and\or builtin.
title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀

notes:
it shows can't find dsetup.dll at startup.
keep playing opening song if you didn't make some input.
Sound problem, no background music, no character voice, no UI sound effect.
title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀

notes:
Initially, no sound and improper video loop. My fix:
1) Copy DSETUP.dll and dsetup32.dll from subfolder _CommonRedist/DirectX/Jun2010/
2) Paste into base folder Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3/
After doing tweak the game runs very well.
title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀

notes: Huge issues with framerate, no sound in game, intro in main menu starts over and over again.
title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀

notes: after copying DSETUP.dll and dsetup32.dll from subfolder _CommonRedist/DirectX/Jun2010/ and pasting it into the main folder, the game works perfectly.
title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀
